name: GR on WP signup
author: Rezaur Chowdhury

sections.description:
This is the plugin for, getresponse-integration plugin user,
who want their visitors signup by wp regular register form,
automatically listed to getresponse contact list.

It work like getresponse-integration plugin “Subscribe via Comment”

The plug in require getresponse-integration plugin install to activate.
https://wordpress.org/plugins/getresponse-integration/
sections.faq:
can I on/off it from admin

Not un till now, but maybe by next release.
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Initial release

0.2

  • This is a update release as the getresponse wp integration, changed to api for connectivity.

0.3

  • This is a update release as the getresponse wp integration, changed the classname from getresponse to getresponseintegration.

0.4

  • A quicky for class(GetResponse and GetResponseIntegration) change.

short_description: This plugin is addon/child for getresponse-integration plugin. Important: This option is added to getresponse-integration plugin from ver-2.1
description:
This is the plugin for, getresponse-integration plugin user,
who want their visitors signup by wp regular register form,
automatically listed to getresponse contact list.

It work like getresponse-integration plugin “Subscribe via Comment”

The plug in require getresponse-integration plugin install to activate.

upgrade_notice.0.4: This is a update release is a quicky for getresponse integration older(below 2.0.6) version and newer version(above 2.0.7) support, changed the classname from getresponse to getresponseintegration.
